languages.text: {n}Кибелла бросает на вас взгляд — неожиданно растерянный и ранимый. Впрочем, иллюзия держится всего мгновение.{/n} "Благодарю, Домин'{name}. Я тоже отпускаю тебя. Ступай на свою стезю. Я же попробую отыскать ту, что предназначена мне".

traits.locale_text: {n}Кибелла бросает на вас взгляд — неожиданно растерянный и ранимый. Впрочем, иллюзия держится всего мгновение — и вот на вас вновь взирает культистка Кровавой паутины.{/n} "Благодарю тебя, Эним'{name}. Я тоже отпускаю тебя... ступай на свою стезю. Я же... попробую отыскать ту, что предназначена мне".

languages.text: {n}Kibellah glances at you, looking suddenly lost and vulnerable. However, the illusion quickly passes.{/n} "Thank you, Domin'{name}. As you are letting me go, so will I let go of you. Follow your own thread, and I will try to find the one meant for me."
languages.original_text: {n}Кибелла бросает на вас взгляд — неожиданно растерянный и ранимый. Впрочем, иллюзия держится всего мгновение.{/n} "Благодарю, Домин'{name}. Я тоже отпускаю тебя. Ступай на свою стезю. Я же попробую отыскать ту, что предназначена мне".

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah glances at you, suddenly looking lost and vulnerable. However, the illusion quickly passes.{/n} "Thank you, Enim'{name}. So am I letting you go. Follow your own way. And I will try to find the one that's meant for me."

{n}Kibellah glances at you, suddenly looking lost and vulnerable. However, the illusion quickly passes.{/n} "Thank you, Enim'{name}. So am I letting you go. Follow your own way. And I will try to find the one that's meant for me."

{n}Kibellah glances at you, looking suddenly lost and vulnerable. However, the illusion quickly passes.{/n} "Thank you, Enim'{name}. So, I will let you go. Follow your own way, and I will try to find the one meant for me."

{n}Kibellah glances at you, looking suddenly lost and vulnerable. However, the illusion quickly passes.{/n} "Thank you, Enim'{name}. So, I will let you go. Follow your own way, and I will try to find the one meant for me."

{n}Kibellah glances at you, looking suddenly lost and vulnerable. However, the illusion quickly passes.{/n} "Thank you, Domin'{name}. As you are letting me go, so will I let go of you. Follow your own thread, and I will try to find the one meant for me."

{n}Kibellah glances at you, looking suddenly lost and vulnerable. However, the illusion quickly passes.{/n} "Thank you, Domin'{name}. As you are letting me go, so will I let go of you. Follow your own thread, and I will try to find the one meant for me."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah te clava la mirada, y de repente se te antoja perdida y vulnerable. Sin embargo, la ilusión no tarda en disiparse.{/n} «Gracias, Domin'{name}. Así como usted me deja libre, yo también {mf|lo|la} libero. Siga su propio hilo, que yo trataré de hallar el que me corresponde».
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah glances at you, looking suddenly lost and vulnerable. However, the illusion quickly passes.{/n} "Thank you, Domin'{name}. As you are letting me go, so will I let go of you. Follow your own thread, and I will try to find the one meant for me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah te clava la mirada, y de repente se te antoja perdida y vulnerable. Sin embargo, la ilusión no tarda en disiparse.{/n} «Gracias, Domin'{name}. Así como usted me deja libre, yo también {mf|lo|la} libero. Siga su propio hilo, que yo trataré de hallar el que me corresponde».

{n}Kibellah te clava la mirada, y de repente se te antoja perdida y vulnerable. Sin embargo, la ilusión no tarda en disiparse.{/n} «Gracias, Enim'{name}. Así como usted me deja libre, yo también {mf|lo|la} libero. Siga su propio camino, que yo trataré de hallar el que me corresponde».

languages.text: {n}キベラは、あなたを睨みつけ、不意に戸惑い弱々しい表情になる。しかし、その幻想はすぐに消えた。{/n}「ありがとう、ドミン・{name}。あなたが私を手放すのなら、私もあなたを手放す。自分の糸を進んで。私も自分のための糸を探そう」
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah glances at you, looking suddenly lost and vulnerable. However, the illusion quickly passes.{/n} "Thank you, Domin'{name}. As you are letting me go, so will I let go of you. Follow your own thread, and I will try to find the one meant for me."

traits.locale_text: {n}キベラは、あなたを睨みつけ、不意に戸惑い弱々しい表情になる。しかし、その幻想はすぐに消えた。{/n}「ありがとう、ドミン・{name}。あなたが私を手放すのなら、私もあなたを手放す。自分の糸を進んで。私も自分のための糸を探そう」
{n}キベラは、あなたを睨みつけ、不意に戸惑い弱々しい表情になる。しかし、その幻想はすぐに消えた。{/n}「ありがとう、エニム・{name}。あなたが私を手放すのなら、私もあなたを手放すわ。自分の道を進んで。私も自分のための道を探すから」

languages.text: {n}绮贝菈瞥了你一眼，似乎突然之间变得无比迷茫、脆弱。然而，这样的错觉很快就消失了。{/n}“谢谢你，秘者{name}。既然你放开了我，那我也愿意放开你。沿着你自己的丝线前进吧，我也会努力寻找属于我的丝线。”
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah glances at you, looking suddenly lost and vulnerable. However, the illusion quickly passes.{/n} "Thank you, Domin'{name}. As you are letting me go, so will I let go of you. Follow your own thread, and I will try to find the one meant for me."

traits.locale_text: {n}绮贝菈瞥了你一眼，似乎突然之间变得无比迷茫、脆弱。然而，这样的错觉很快就消失了。{/n}“谢谢你，秘者{name}。既然你放开了我，那我也愿意放开你。沿着你自己的丝线前进吧，我也会努力寻找属于我的丝线。”
{n}绮贝菈瞥了你一眼，似乎突然之间变得无比迷茫、脆弱。然而，这样的错觉很快就消失了。{/n}“谢谢你，秘者{name}。既然你放开了我，那我也愿意放开你。踏上你自己的道路吧，我也会努力寻找属于我的道路。”

languages.text: {n}Kibellah blickt dich an und wirkt plötzlich verloren und verletzlich. Doch die Illusion verfliegt rasch wieder.{/n} "Danke, Domin'{name}. So wie Ihr mich gehen lasst, werde auch ich Euch gehen lassen. Folgt Euren eigenen Faden, und ich werde den suchen, der für mich bestimmt ist."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah glances at you, looking suddenly lost and vulnerable. However, the illusion quickly passes.{/n} "Thank you, Domin'{name}. As you are letting me go, so will I let go of you. Follow your own thread, and I will try to find the one meant for me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah blickt dich an und wirkt plötzlich verloren und verletzlich. Doch die Illusion verfliegt rasch wieder.{/n} "Danke, Domin'{name}. So wie Ihr mich gehen lasst, werde auch ich Euch gehen lassen. Folgt Euren eigenen Faden, und ich werde den suchen, der für mich bestimmt ist."

{n}Kibellah blickt dich an und wirkt plötzlich verloren und verletzlich. Doch die Illusion verfliegt rasch wieder.{/n} "Danke, Enim'{name}. So wie Ihr mich gehen lasst, werde auch ich Euch gehen lassen. Folgt Euren eigenen Weg, und ich werde den suchen, der für mich bestimmt ist."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah vous regarde, et subitement, elle vous semble perdue et vulnérable. Cependant, cette illusion se dissipe rapidement.{/n} « Merci, Domin'{name}. Vous l'aurez voulu, c'est ici que nos chemins se séparent. Suivez votre propre fil, et je m'efforcerai de trouver le mien de mon côté. »
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah glances at you, looking suddenly lost and vulnerable. However, the illusion quickly passes.{/n} "Thank you, Domin'{name}. As you are letting me go, so will I let go of you. Follow your own thread, and I will try to find the one meant for me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah vous regarde, et subitement, elle vous semble perdue et vulnérable. Cependant, cette illusion se dissipe rapidement.{/n} « Merci, Domin'{name}. Vous l'aurez voulu, c'est ici que nos chemins se séparent. Suivez votre propre fil, et je m'efforcerai de trouver le mien de mon côté. »

{n}Kibellah vous regarde, et subitement, elle vous semble perdue et vulnérable. Cependant, cette illusion se dissipe rapidement.{/n} « Merci, Enim'{name}. Vous l'aurez voulu, c'est ici que nos chemins se séparent. Suivez votre propre destinée, et je m'efforcerai de trouver la mienne de mon côté. »

languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah glances at you, looking suddenly lost and vulnerable. However, the illusion quickly passes.{/n} "Thank you, Domin'. As you are letting me go, so will I let go of you. Follow your own thread, and I will try to find the one meant for me."

languages.text: {n}Bir anda gözüne çaresiz ve korunmasız görünen Kibellah, göz ucuyla sana bakıyor. Sonrasında bu yanılsama hızlıca geçiyor.{/n} "Teşekkür ederim Domin'{name}. Senin beni azat ettiğin gibi ben de seni azat ediyorum. Sen kendi ipliğinin peşine düş, ben de kendiminkini bulmaya çalışayım."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah glances at you, looking suddenly lost and vulnerable. However, the illusion quickly passes.{/n} "Thank you, Domin'{name}. As you are letting me go, so will I let go of you. Follow your own thread, and I will try to find the one meant for me."
